steps.name: Verify client notes can be change from UI
check via api that the simple client has been created
search a new client by phone number
assert - search returns one customer in UI

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oyRdqp7Nz6, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-17, birthyear=1961, address=Suite 843 46662 Stiedemann Oval, Kundeport, AK 98527, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","desc":"1ZnsvZ1D_4","sum":73016005}], phone=["0507-78-20-19"], email=christopher.kemmer@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","text":"WI5OiYpzTE"}], name=Deja Rohan, gender=female)

steps.name: search client by new phone number via api
assert via api that the client notes has been updated by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oyRdqp7Nz6, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-17, birthyear=1961, address=Suite 843 46662 Stiedemann Oval, Kundeport, AK 98527, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","desc":"1ZnsvZ1D_4","sum":73016005}], phone=["0507-78-20-19"], email=christopher.kemmer@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","text":"WI5OiYpzTE"}], name=Deja Rohan, gender=female)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oyRdqp7Nz6, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-17, birthyear=1961, address=Suite 843 46662 Stiedemann Oval, Kundeport, AK 98527, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","desc":"1ZnsvZ1D_4","sum":73016005}], phone=["0507-78-20-19"], email=christopher.kemmer@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:30:28","text":"WI5OiYpzTE"}], name=Deja Rohan, gender=female)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=2974, name=Deja Rohan, phone=0507782019, profileImage=31.svg, address=Suite 843 46662 Stiedemann Oval, Kundeport, AK 98527, status=oyRdqp7Nz6, permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972507782019)'
